name: sumapay
description:
The name “SUMA” is a combination of two words (SUSU + CHAMA). “Susu” in the Akan language means “plan” in the context of saving money within a group of people. “Chama” as translated in Swahili refers to a party, society or organization that is united towards a common goal.
